questions.question: Can you give me some knowledge about data science ?
questions.answer: Sure!! It is an interdisciplinary field that involves the use of statistical and computational methods to extract actionable insights and knowledge from data. It involves a sequence of steps like collecting the data , cleaning the data , Exploratory data analysis and visualizing the data, formulating hypothesis and testing them using statistical methods and various machine learning algorithms , and getting feedback

questions.question: How the current technology of AI changing the world?
questions.answer: AI has the potential to transform almost every industry and aspect of our daily lives . It has done revolutionary changes in the healthcare system,finance, transportation, financing and many more . In the upcoming time AI will rule the world seeing the current dependencies on it.

questions.question: How to do placement preparation?
questions.answer: Some tips which will help you to prepare for your placements:1. Practice aptitude tests 2.Improve your technical skills . Grab onto your coding skills if you are preparing for that field. 3.Work on soft skills 4.Do research about the recruiting companies 5. Attend job fairs and social events and build up your connection

questions.question: How to get relief from stress during studies?
questions.answer: Plan your study schedules, take short breaks, listen to your favourite music in the breaks. take some fresh air, talk to your friends and families . Just remember its only an exam and you have a lot to experience in your life after it . So just chillll
